sen.j: 徳川誠（とくがわまこと、1887年10月31日 - 1968年11月11日）は、江戸幕府第15代将軍徳川慶喜の九男。
sen.e: Makoto TOKUGAWA was the ninth son of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA, the 15th shogun of the Edo bakufu, and was born on October 31, 1887 and died on November 11, 1968.
Makoto TOKUGAWA (October 31, 1887 - November 11, 1968) was the ninth son of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA, the 15th shogun of the Edo bakufu.
sen.cmt: 生年没年は括弧に挿入しました。
sen.e: Makoto TOKUGAWA (October 31, 1887 - November 11, 1968) was the ninth son of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA, the 15th shogun of the Edo bakufu.

sen.j: 母は中根芳三郎の娘・中根幸。
sen.e: His mother was Sachi NAKANE, Yoshisaburo NAKANE's daughter.
His mother was Sachi NAKANE, a daughter of Yoshisaburo NAKANE.
sen.cmt: NAKANE's daughterをa daughter of NAKANEに変更しました。
sen.e: His mother was Sachi NAKANE, a daughter of Yoshisaburo NAKANE.
He was a baron.
He was a baron.
He was a baron.

sen.j: 妻は男爵・名和長慶の娘霽子で息子に徳川脩がいる。
sen.e: Her wife was Seiko NAWA, baron Nagayoshi NAWA's daughter, and his son was Osamu TOKUGAWA.
His wife was Seiko NAWA, a daughter of baron Nagayoshi NAWA, and his son was Osamu TOKUGAWA.
sen.cmt: 文頭をHisに訂正しました。NAWA's daughterをa daughter ofの形に変更しました。
sen.e: His wife was Seiko NAWA, a daughter of baron Nagayoshi NAWA, and his son was Osamu TOKUGAWA.

sen.j: 徳川慶喜家から分家し、1913年11月5日に男爵に叙される。
sen.e: He became a cadet branch of the Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA family and was baronized on November 5, 1913.
He became a cadet branch of the Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA family and was baronized on November 5, 1913.
He became a cadet branch of the Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA family and was baronized on November 5, 1913.

sen.j: 横浜正金銀行に勤務した。
sen.e: He worked for Yokohama Specie Bank.
He worked for Yokohama Specie Bank.
He worked for Yokohama Specie Bank.
He later became a member of Kizokuin (the House of Peers).
He later became a member of Kizokuin (the House of Peers).
He later became a member of Kizokuin (the House of Peers).
